data.title: Daryl Hannah: at last the blonde has more fun
data.meta_description: Daryl Hannah has not had a facelift. “I mean, come on!” she says, snorting derisively and pointing a long, delicate finger towards her well-preserved features. “I don’t think I’d look like this if I’d
data.text:
Daryl Hannah has not had a facelift. “I mean, come on!” she says, snorting derisively and pointing a long, delicate finger towards her well-preserved features. “I don’t think I’d look like this if I’d had a facelift!” We didn’t mean to get on to plastic surgery so quickly. It just happened. One minute Hannah — an iconic actress whose 30-year career has stretched from Splash to Kill Bill and beyond, and an environmental activist who’s been arrested twice in the line of duty — was contemplating hitting 50 this year. “I snowboard, I ride horses, and I’m very active,” she had said, calmly. “So I’m not looking forward to getting older and becoming more, well, breakable.”

The next minute, with something seemingly niggling inside her,
